4.3.3 The Path structure

setSourcePath

Function

Structure

Shell.Path

Type

val setSourcePath: string list -> unit

Syntax

setSourcePath directories -> ()

Arguments

directories
A list of directories to make up the source path.

Values

()

Description

Sets the source path to the list directories.
